import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { deleteProduct } from "../services"; import Botton from './Botton' const ListProducts = ({ products }) => { const [show,setShow] = useState(false) const handleClose = () => setShow(false); return (
{products.map((item, index) => (
{item.name}

Descripci√≥n: {item.description}

Precio: {item.UnitaryPrice}

setShow(true) }/>
))}
) } export default ListProducts
